Hmm.  I don't know how to best say this, but here's my attempt:

Somehow, while playing through gladiator scenarios, I managed to cause 
the saved game file to lose track of scenarios I have gone through.  I 
have already emailed Tom Ricket the saved game and he could not reason 
out how it happenned.  I am not revealing any more information than 
that.

I, also, want to take time to remind potential tournament players that 
 altering the saved game file used for the tournament is considered 
cheating and any person caught doing that will be immediately expelled 
from the tournament.
